channel.title: Delete Item Off Ground

item.title: Delete Item Off Ground
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY);
addItem(magicOnItemID, itemAmount);
ItemHandler.removeItem(magicOnItemID, magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY, itemAmount);
removeGroundItem(magicOnItemX, magicOnItemY, magicOnItemID);

That’s a few lines from my teleGrab

item.title: Delete Item Off Ground
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

item spawnpoints mine looks like this

public class itemspawnpoints {
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems() {
    for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) {
        if (spawntimer <= 1) {
            ItemHandler.addItem(2414, 3118, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Zammy Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2412, 3119, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Sara Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2413, 3120, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Guthix Cape	
            spawntimer = 100;
        }
    }
}

public void process() {
    LoadItems();
    spawntimer -= 1;
}

}

if you wanted to remove them delete the
temHandler.addItem(2414, 3118, 9848, 1,
ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Zammy Cape
ItemHandler.addItem(2412, 3119, 9848, 1,
ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Sara Cape
ItemHandler.addItem(2413, 3120, 9848, 1,
ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Guthix Cape

Read full topic
